definition: A collection or group of things or people, often referring to a large quantity or number. It is commonly used to describe a multitude of items, individuals, or concepts, and can be used in various contexts such as mathematics, statistics, or everyday language.

examples.german: Die Menge der Menschen auf dem Platz war beeindruckend.
examples.english: The crowd of people in the square was impressive.

examples.german: Eine große Menge Schnee fiel über Nacht.
examples.english: A large amount of snow fell overnight.

examples.german: Die Menge an Informationen, die er behalten kann, ist erstaunlich.
examples.english: The amount of information he can retain is astonishing.

examples.german: Ich habe eine Menge Arbeit vor mir.
examples.english: I have a lot of work ahead of me.

examples.german: Die Menge der Bücher in der Bibliothek ist beeindruckend.
examples.english: The quantity of books in the library is impressive.
